instruction: In this task you're given two statements in Marathi. You must judge whether the second sentence is the cause or effect of the first one. The sentences are separated by a newline character. Output either the word 'cause' or 'effect' .
input:
भाडेकरू अपार्टमेंटमधून काढून टाकले गेले. 
 त्यांचे भाडे देण्यास त्यांनी दुर्लक्ष केले.

input:
